sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Box, Image } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import defaults from '../common/defaults'
import { prettifyNumber } from '../common/utils'

export const USDVpriceIndicator = () => {

	return (
		<>
			<Box
				size='md'
				display='flex'
				flexDirection='row'
				alignItems='center'
				padding='0 .10rem'
				transform={{
					base: 'scale(0.86)',
					sm: 'scale(1)',
				}}
			>
				<Box
					fontSize={{ base: '0.65rem', sm: 'sm' }}
					display='inline-flex'
					alignItems='center'
					justifyContent='center'
					borderRadius='12px'
					background='#000'
					p='7px 10px'
					gridGap='13px'
					transform={{
						base: 'scale(0.86)',
						sm: 'scale(1)',
					}}
				>
					<Box
						d='flex'
						alignItems='center'
						fontWeight='600'
					>
						<Image
							width='24px'
							height='24px'
							mr='5px'
							src={defaults.usdv.logoURI}
							alt={`${defaults.usdv.name} token`}
						/>
						<Box
							as='h3'
							m='0'
							fontSize='1.02rem'
							fontWeight='bold'
							textTransform='capitalize'>
							${prettifyNumber(12.123288, 0, 2, 'us')}
						</Box>
					</Box>
				</Box>
			</Box>
		</>
	)
}
